name: job card test server script
script:
# Auto-fill Test Value 1 with uppercase of Test Value 2
if doc.test_value_2:
    doc.test_value_1 = doc.test_value_2.upper()

# If both fields empty â†’ set default
if not doc.test_value_1 and not doc.test_value_2:
    doc.test_value_1 = "AUTO-GENERATED"
    doc.test_value_2 = "demo"

# Show popup for testing
frappe.msgprint(f"Job Card Server Script executed for: {doc.name}")

name: testing server script
test doc server script
script:
# This script ensures the title is not empty and formats it properly
if not doc.title:
    frappe.throw("Title is mandatory. Please enter a title.")

# Optional: Automatically format title (capitalize first letter)
doc.title = doc.title.strip().title()
